hero.headline: Virgo School — classical western astrology online
hero.subline: We guide beginners and practicing astrologers with structured modules, mentorship, and live webinars.

metrics.title: Virgo in numbers
metrics.description: The school combines classical western methodology with modern online delivery.

webinar.title: Astrology in life and business
webinar.description: Watch the open class where Irina Abdraimova shows how horary charts guide practical decisions.
webinar.note: “Nature gave astrology as the ally of astronomy.” — J. Kepler

education.title: Classical approach, modern format
education.description: Virgo School explains planetary laws in a structured, scientific way without mysticism.
education.body: Each topic includes HD video lessons, downloadable tables, homework, and curator feedback in WhatsApp.
highlights: Mentorship and webinars during every module
Access to the platform and community for 12 months

application.title: How training works
application.description: Every module equals 12 academic hours — three sessions per week.

steps.title: Leave a request
steps.description: Write on WhatsApp +7 701 533 0494 or email info@virgoschool.com.

steps.title: Select a program
steps.description: We help match your goals, level, and schedule.

steps.title: Pay for the module
steps.description: Transfer $150 via card or Western Union and send the receipt.

steps.title: Get access
steps.description: Within 24 hours you receive the LMS login, video lessons, and curator chat.

application.note: Support stays with you throughout the year — webinars, homework feedback, and live Q&A.

instructionsStripeSteps: Use the test card below to simulate a successful charge.

Submit payment to be redirected back to Virgo School.
instructionsYooKassaSteps: Follow the link to open the secure YooKassa checkout page.
Choose SBP, bank card, or wallet and complete the payment in test mode.
Come back to Virgo School to refresh your order status.
instructionsCloudPaymentsSteps: Open the CloudPayments widget to pay with card or Apple/Google Pay.
Use the generated link in a new tab; the invoice stays active for 30 minutes.
Keep this Virgo School tab open so we can sync the confirmation automatically.

lessonQuiz.noAttempts: You have not taken this quiz yet.
lessonQuiz.submitSuccess: Attempt saved. Review the results below.
lessonQuiz.submitFailure: Attempt saved. Review the answer key and try again.
lessonQuiz.submitError: We could not submit the quiz. Please try again.
lessonQuiz.limitReached: You have used all attempts for this quiz.
lessonQuiz.focusHintTip: Turn on focus mode to minimize distractions and keep the timer pinned on screen.
lessonQuiz.focusHintActive: Focus mode is on. Stay in fullscreen and keep this tab visible so the attempt stays valid.
lessonQuiz.focusHintLost: You exited focus mode. Re-enter fullscreen to stay on pace before submitting.
lessonQuiz.focusHintHidden: This tab is hidden. Return to the quiz to avoid losing progress.
lessonQuiz.timerHint: Stay focused — the timer keeps running even in other tabs.
lessonQuiz.timerExpired: Time is up. Start a new attempt to continue.
lessonQuiz.reportTimeHint: Finish before the timer expires to avoid an auto-fail.
lessonQuiz.reportTip: Need a better score? Review the breakdown before your next try.
lessonQuiz.autoSubmitMessage: Time is up. We submitted the answers you selected.
lessonQuiz.leaveWarning: Your selections stay local until you submit. Don’t close this tab or you’ll lose the attempt.

about.title: About
about.intro: Virgo School helps creatives grow careers in digital industries
about.missionBody: We blend creativity and technology with quarterly course refreshes and mentors still active in top studios.
about.methodDescription: Every track mixes strategy, tooling, and soft skills.
methodHighlights: Hybrid learning: live seminars + on-demand modules
Real briefs sourced from partner companies
about.mentorsBody: 40+ experts across design, production, marketing, and game development.
about.ctaDescription: Share your goals and receive a personalized plan within 24 hours.

servicesPage.title: Astrology services
servicesPage.intro: Individual consultations from Virgo School mentors help you make timely decisions about relationships, business, and relocation.

cards.title: Synastry astrology
cards.description: Compatibility analysis that compares natal charts to highlight strengths, risks, and financial dynamics.

cards.title: Horary astrology
cards.description: Get a precise answer to an urgent question regarding deals, travel, or personal choices.

cards.title: Rectification table
cards.description: We refine the exact birth time using documented events so future forecasts become accurate.

servicesPage.note: Write to WhatsApp +7 701 533 0494 to reserve the slot and receive preparation instructions.

applyPage.title: How to apply
applyPage.intro: Follow the steps below to join Virgo School. Enrollment is open year-round.

steps.title: Send a message
steps.description: Contact us via WhatsApp or email info@virgoschool.com and tell us about your goals.

steps.title: Pick a module
steps.description: We evaluate your level and recommend the base, compatibility, or forecasting program.

steps.title: Confirm payment
steps.description: Pay for one module ($150) or the full program and send the receipt for instant confirmation.

steps.title: Start learning
steps.description: Within 24 hours you receive access to the platform, chat, and upcoming webinar schedule.

items.question: What does the base course include?
items.answer: History of astrology, cosmogram, planetology, aspects, and practice on real charts across six modules.

items.question: How often are live sessions?
items.answer: Three times per week plus additional webinars when questions accumulate.

items.question: Can I study while working?
items.answer: Yes. Lessons are on demand, and you can ask questions in chat at any time.
